Student Grid

First Name Last Name Mobile Email NIC
{{ student.firstName }} {{ student.lastName }} {{ student.mobile }} {{ student.email }} {{ student.nic }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Student } from '../student'; import { StudentService } from '../student.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-student-grid', templateUrl: './student-grid.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student-grid.component.css'], }) export class StudentGridComponent implements OnInit { students: Student[] = []; constructor(private studentService: StudentService) {} ngOnInit() { this.getStudents(); } getStudents() { this.studentService.getStudents().subscribe((students) => { this.students = students; }); } }
